Writers.

Christopher Redmond

Christopher originally hails from the great Canadian prairies, which he left during his formative years to study film at Carleton University. While he is perhaps most famous for watching and reviewing 500 films in one year, he is also the founder of the East African film school Burundi Film Center, and is the film critic for Live 88.5 FM in Ottawa. His short films have appeared at festivals across the world, and he has served as a jury member for the The Rwanda Film Festival, The Dawson City International Short Film Festival, and the Digi60 Film Festival.

By Christopher Redmond
